radios

radios creates a list of radio buttons from an array each item in the array should have a display and value attribute

usage:

template = -> radios "radio_group", [{display: 'Yes', value: 'y'}, {display: 'No', value: 'n'}]

renders

 
module.exports = (name, list, attributes) ->
  for item in list
    radiobtn name, item.display, item.value, attributes
